DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate ocufilcon D lens compare ocufilcon B lens 1-week crossover , daily wear regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Two Marketed 1-day Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This study design evaluate 2 daily disposable contact lenses currently clear USA market . Study ocufilcon D lens compare ocufilcon B lens 1-week crossover , daily wear regimen . The primary objective comparison fit characteristic . The secondary objective comparison comfort , end day comfort dryness measure .
DOC.criteria: Has self report oculovisual examination last two year . Is able wear study lens least eight hour day , seven day week Aged 1840 year full legal capacity volunteer Has distance contact lens prescription 0.25 6.00D inclusive Has spectacle astigmatism < 1.00D eye Baseline vision 20/20 bestcorrected eye . Is correctable least 20/25 distance visual acuity study contact lenses eye Has read understood consent form willing sign consent form Willing able follow participant instruction attend require study visit Has wear soft contact lenses least two week prior study ( daily wear ) . Currently wear contact lens extend wear basis . Not current past wearer ocufilcon B 52 % 1day lens . Has undergone anterior ocular surgery Is aphakic Has never wear contact lenses Has systemic disease clinically contraindicate contact lens Has active ocular disease severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion ( dry eye ) Use systemic topical medication affect ocular health visual performance Slit lamp finding grade great 1.0 use grade scale Appendix 3 Not possible achieve satisfactory fit lens design use study Has keratoconus corneal irregularity Participating another eyerelated clinical trial Pregnant , lactate planning pregnancy
